home.description: I am Dr. Asya, your personal virtual assistant. I suggest you undergo a comprehensive diagnosis to assess memory and identify dementia risks.
home.tests_description: Memory diagnostics and dementia risk assessment

history.title: History
history.history_empty_description: Take your first test to see results

test_descriptions.VISUAL_MEMORY: Test to assess the ability to remember and reproduce visual information
test_descriptions.VERBAL_MEMORY: Test to assess the ability to remember and reproduce verbal information
test_descriptions.AUDITORY_MEMORY: Test to assess the ability to remember and reproduce auditory information
test_descriptions.DIGIT_SPAN: Test to assess short-term memory capacity for digital information
test_descriptions.VISUAL_ATTENTION: Test to assess the ability to concentrate attention on visual stimuli
test_descriptions.STROOP_TEST: Test to assess cognitive control and inhibition of automatic reactions
test_descriptions.ARITHMETIC: Test to assess the ability to perform mental mathematical calculations
test_descriptions.SYMBOL_MEMORY: Test to assess the ability to remember correspondences between symbols and values

test_instructions.VERBAL_MEMORY: You will be presented with a list of words. Remember and reproduce them.
test_instructions.AUDITORY_MEMORY: You will hear sequences of digits and words. Repeat them.
test_instructions.DIGIT_SPAN: You will be shown sequences of digits. Repeat them in the correct order.
test_instructions.VISUAL_ATTENTION: Find and mark target objects among distracting elements.
test_instructions.STROOP_TEST: Name the color of the text, not what is written.
test_instructions.SYMBOL_MEMORY: Remember the correspondence of symbols and numbers, then convert symbols to numbers.

results.high_performance: Excellent result! Your memory is working very well.
results.medium_performance: Good result! There's potential for improvement.
results.low_performance: The result can be improved. Try taking the test again.

game.was_image_shown: Was this image shown in the list?
game.stroop_instruction: Tap the screen when the color name matches the color of its letters
game.find_first_letter: Find the first letter of the word
game.verbal_memory_good: Excellent result! You correctly identified the first letter of the word, indicating well-developed verbal memory.
game.verbal_memory_bad: Try again! Practice will help you better remember sounds and associate them with letters.
game.stroop_good: Excellent result! Your ability to concentrate and suppress interference is very good.
game.stroop_medium: Good result! There's potential for improving attention concentration.
game.stroop_bad: The result can be improved. Attention training will help you better cope with distracting factors.
game.count_good: Excellent result! Your mental arithmetic skills and working memory work very well.
game.count_medium: Good result! There's potential for developing mental arithmetic skills.
game.count_bad: The result can be improved. Regular practice will help develop quick calculation skills.
game.audio_good: Excellent result! Your auditory memory and ability to recognize voiced objects work well.
game.audio_bad: Try again! Developing auditory attention will help you better remember audio information.
game.visual_good: Excellent result! Your visual memory retains information excellently.
game.visual_medium: Good result! There are opportunities for developing visual memory.
game.visual_bad: The result can be improved. Reading and visualization will help strengthen memory.
game.digit_good: Excellent result! Your short-term memory works very well.
game.digit_medium: Good result! There's potential for developing short-term memory.
game.digit_bad: The result can be improved. Training will help increase memory capacity.
game.symbol_good: Excellent result! Your visual memory and attention work very well.
game.symbol_medium: Good result! There's potential for developing symbolic memory.
game.symbol_bad: The result can be improved. Practice will help you better remember symbols.

errors.select_consultation_type: Select consultation type: online or offline
